item.description: There are some easy/moderate logging trails that lead to some sweet views. The trails cross private property but are open to all, provided you use the area respectfully. Will park at my friend's place and walk up, so maybe about 5 miles and 3 hours total. Pack your camera and bug repellant and you should be set. After we get off the hill we will enjoy lunch at Long Trail.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking & beer (Sun., 7/8)
